Html:
Hi,
I added RowDetailsTemplate to my datagrid. The details are shown when the user clicks on some row. However, to hide the details the user has to click on a different row, which shows its details. My user wants to click on the same row again to hide the details. Is there any easy way to do it?

hi,
clicking Strg+left Mouse Button on the row details works.

Wow! Ctrl works! Thanks!

This is crazy! Why did they do it this way?
